nodes.bodyText: Thanks you're right I should have thought about it. It will also enable me to cleanly surround it with try-catch so if it will fail in the future it won't stop the client from sending the message.

we should put this in If (LOGGER.isDebugEnabled()) block otherwise we'll do all the work for the getPostQuery, then pass the argument to the function which will just throw it away since in production we don't have debug enabled (so the getPostQuery call is just wasted).
